channel.title: Comments on: UC Santa Cruz Library visit

item.title: By: Joanna Kang
item.dc:creator: Joanna Kang
item.description: These library visits have been great! Thank you for organizing so many wonderful tours, Jill!
item.content:encoded: These library visits have been great! Thank you for organizing so many wonderful tours, Jill!

item.title: By: Jill Barr-Walker
item.dc:creator: Jill Barr-Walker
item.description:
Here are my personal faves from our library visits:
Favorite library tour: UC Berkeley (optometry yearbooks, dinosaurs, nap pods) Favorite happy hour: SF Botanical Garden Favorite souvenir: Shredded money, Federal Reserve Favorite librarian: Dee Dee, SFPL Favorite spot: Reading porch, UC Santa Cruz
Thanks to everyone who joined our adventures this year!
item.content:encoded:
Here are my personal faves from our library visits:

Favorite library tour: UC Berkeley (optometry yearbooks, dinosaurs, nap pods)
Favorite happy hour: SF Botanical Garden
Favorite souvenir: Shredded money, Federal Reserve
Favorite librarian: Dee Dee, SFPL
Favorite spot: Reading porch, UC Santa Cruz

Thanks to everyone who joined our adventures this year!
